column2: SEACOR Holdings, Inc. engages in the provision of transportation and logistics solutions through its subsidiaries. The company is headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and currently employs 2,518 full-time employees. The firm's segments include, Inland River Services, Shipping Services and Illinois Corn Processing. Inland River Services segment operates river transportation equipment used for moving agricultural and industrial commodities and petroleum and chemical products. Shipping Services segment operates a fleet of United States flag marine transportation related assets. Illinois Corn Processing segment produces alcohol used in the food, beverage, industrial and petrochemical end-markets. The firm also offers emergency and crisis services, lending and leasing activities, and noncontrolling investments in various other businesses.
